pli-tv-kd1:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho.
pli-tv-kd1:1.1.2: Atha kho bhagavā bodhirukkhamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
pli-tv-kd1:1.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paṭhamaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:1.2.2: “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti.
pli-tv-kd1:1.2.4: Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho, viññāṇanirodhā nāmarūpanirodho, nāmarūpanirodhā saḷāyatananirodho, saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho, vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti.
pli-tv-kd1:1.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:1.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā majjhimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:1.5.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:1.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā pacchimaṃ yāmaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:1.7.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:2.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā ajapālanigrodhamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
pli-tv-kd1:2.2.1: Atha kho aññataro huṃhuṅkajātiko brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:2.2.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:2.2.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:2.2.5: “kittāvatā nu kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo hoti, katame ca pana brāhmaṇakaraṇā dhammā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:2.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:3.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā ajapālanigrodhamūlā yena mucalindo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā mucalindamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
pli-tv-kd1:3.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena mahā akālamegho udapādi, sattāhavaddalikā sītavātaduddinī.
pli-tv-kd1:3.2.2: Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājā sakabhavanā nikkhamitvā bhagavato kāyaṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi parikkhipitvā uparimuddhani mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ karitvā aṭṭhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:3.2.3: “mā bhagavantaṃ sītaṃ, mā bhagavantaṃ uṇhaṃ, mā bhagavantaṃ ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphasso”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:3.3.1: Atha kho mucalindo nāgarājā sattāhassa accayena viddhaṃ vigatavalāhakaṃ devaṃ viditvā bhagavato kāyā bhoge viniveṭhetvā sakavaṇṇaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā bhagavato purato aṭṭhāsi pañjaliko bhagavantaṃ namassamāno.
pli-tv-kd1:3.3.2: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:4.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā mucalindamūlā yena rājāyatanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā rājāyatanamūle sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisīdi vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
pli-tv-kd1:4.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena tapussa bhallikā vāṇijā ukkalā taṃ desaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:4.2.2: Atha kho tapussabhallikānaṃ vāṇijānaṃ ñātisālohitā devatā tapussabhallike vāṇije etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:4.2.4: gacchatha taṃ bhagavantaṃ manthena ca madhupiṇḍikāya ca patimānetha;
pli-tv-kd1:4.2.5: taṃ vo bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:4.3.1: Atha kho tapussabhallikā vāṇijā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:4.3.2: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tapussabhallikā vāṇijā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:4.3.3: “paṭiggaṇhātu no, bhante, bhagavā manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca, yaṃ amhākaṃ assa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:4.4.3: Kimhi nu kho ahaṃ paṭiggaṇheyyaṃ manthañca madhupiṇḍikañcā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:4.4.4: Atha kho cattāro mahārājāno bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya catuddisā cattāro selamaye patte bhagavato upanāmesuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:4.4.6: Paṭiggahesi bhagavā paccagghe selamaye patte manthañca madhupiṇḍikañca, paṭiggahetvā paribhuñji.
pli-tv-kd1:4.5.1: Atha kho tapussabhallikā vāṇijā bhagavantaṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ viditvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:4.5.2: “ete mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma dhammañca, upāsake no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṃ gate”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:4.5.3: Te ca loke paṭhamaṃ upāsakā ahesuṃ dvevācikā.
pli-tv-kd1:5.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā rājāyatanamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:5.2.1: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:5.2.2: “adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
pli-tv-kd1:5.2.3: Ālayarāmā kho panāyaṃ pajā ālayaratā ālayasammuditā.
pli-tv-kd1:5.2.4: Ālayarāmāya kho pana pajāya ālayaratāya ālayasammuditāya duddasaṃ idaṃ ṭhānaṃ yadidaṃ idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo;
pli-tv-kd1:5.2.5: idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:5.2.6: Ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyuṃ, so mamassa kilamatho, sā mamassa vihesā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.3.1: Apissu bhagavantaṃ imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṃsu pubbe assutapubbā—
pli-tv-kd1:5.4.1: Itiha bhagavato paṭisañcikkhato appossukkatāya cittaṃ namati, no dhammadesanāya.
pli-tv-kd1:5.4.2: Atha kho brahmuno sahampatissa bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:5.4.3: “nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko, yatra hi nāma tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa appossukkatāya cittaṃ namati, no dhammadesanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.5.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—brahmaloke antarahito bhagavato purato pāturahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:5.6.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihantvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.6.2: “desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:5.6.3: Santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāro”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.7.1: Idamavoca brahmā sahampati, idaṃ vatvāna athāparaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā brahmānaṃ sahampatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.3: ‘adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.4: Ālayarāmā kho panāyaṃ pajā ālayaratā ālayasammuditā.
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.5: Ālayarāmāya kho pana pajāya ālayaratāya ālayasammuditāya duddasaṃ idaṃ ṭhānaṃ yadidaṃ idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo;
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.6: idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.7: Ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyuṃ, so mamassa kilamatho, sā mamassa vihesā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.8: Apissu maṃ, brahme, imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṃsu pubbe assutapubbā—
pli-tv-kd1:5.8.17: Itiha me, brahme, paṭisañcikkhato appossukkatāya cittaṃ namati no dhammadesanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.1: Dutiyampi kho brahmā sahampati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.2: “desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhammaṃ;
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.3: santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāro”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.4: Idamavoca brahmā sahampati, idaṃ vatvāna athāparaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.19: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā brahmānaṃ sahampatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.21: ‘adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.22: Ālayarāmā kho panāyaṃ pajā ālayaratā ālayasammuditā.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.23: Ālayarāmāya kho pana pajāya ālayaratāya ālayasammuditāya duddasaṃ idaṃ ṭhānaṃ yadidaṃ idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo;
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.24: idampi kho ṭhānaṃ sududdasaṃ yadidaṃ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.25: Ahañceva kho pana dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, pare ca me na ājāneyyuṃ, so mamassa kilamatho, sā mamassa vihesā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.26: Apissu maṃ, brahme, imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṃsu pubbe assutapubbā—
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.35: Itiha me, brahme, paṭisañcikkhato appossukkatāya cittaṃ namati, no dhammadesanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.36: Tatiyampi kho brahmā sahampati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.37: “desetu, bhante, bhagavā dhammaṃ, desetu sugato dhammaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.38: Santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāro”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:5.9.39: Idamavoca brahmā sahampati, idaṃ vatvāna athāparaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:5.10.1: Atha kho bhagavā brahmuno ca ajjhesanaṃ viditvā sattesu ca kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesi.
pli-tv-kd1:5.11.1: Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvine viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassāvine viharante.
pli-tv-kd1:5.11.2: Seyyathāpi nāma uppaliniyaṃ vā paduminiyaṃ vā puṇḍarīkiniyaṃ vā appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni anto nimuggaposīni, appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni samodakaṃ ṭhitāni, appekaccāni uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṃvaḍḍhāni udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitāni anupalittāni udakena;
pli-tv-kd1:5.11.3: evamevaṃ bhagavā buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento addasa satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye, appekacce paralokavajjabhayadassāvine viharante, appekacce na paralokavajjabhayadassāvine viharante;
pli-tv-kd1:5.13.2: “katāvakāso khomhi bhagavatā dhammadesanāyā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.1.2: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ?
pli-tv-kd1:6.1.5: “ayaṃ kho āḷāro kālāmo paṇḍito byatto medhāvī dīgharattaṃ apparajakkhajātiko;
pli-tv-kd1:6.1.6: yannūnāhaṃ āḷārassa kālāmassa paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, so imaṃ dhammaṃ khippameva ājānissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.2.1: Atha kho antarahitā devatā bhagavato ārocesi—“sattāhakālaṅkato, bhante, āḷāro kālāmo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.2.2: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādi—“sattāhakālaṅkato āḷāro kālāmo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.2.5: sace hi so imaṃ dhammaṃ suṇeyya, khippameva ājāneyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.3.2: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ?
pli-tv-kd1:6.3.5: “ayaṃ kho udako rāmaputto paṇḍito byatto medhāvī dīgharattaṃ apparajakkhajātiko;
pli-tv-kd1:6.3.6: yannūnāhaṃ udakassa rāmaputtassa paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ, so imaṃ dhammaṃ khippameva ājānissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.4.1: Atha kho antarahitā devatā bhagavato ārocesi—“abhidosakālaṅkato, bhante, udako rāmaputto”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.4.2: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādi—“abhidosakālaṅkato udako rāmaputto”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.4.5: sace hi so imaṃ dhammaṃ suṇeyya, khippameva ājāneyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.5.2: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyaṃ?
pli-tv-kd1:6.5.5: “bahukārā kho me pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū, ye maṃ padhānapahitattaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu;
pli-tv-kd1:6.6.1: yannūnāhaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.6.3: “kahaṃ nu kho etarahi pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū viharantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.6.4: Addasā kho bhagavā dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena pañcavaggiye bhikkhū bārāṇasiyaṃ viharante isipatane migadāye.
pli-tv-kd1:6.6.5: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena bārāṇasī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.7.1: Addasā kho upako ājīvako bhagavantaṃ antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannaṃ, disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:6.7.2: “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
pli-tv-kd1:6.8.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā upakaṃ ājīvakaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:6.9.1: “Yathā kho tvaṃ, āvuso, paṭijānāsi, arahasi anantajino”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.9.6: Evaṃ vutte, upako ājīvako hupeyyapāvusoti vatvā sīsaṃ okampetvā ummaggaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.10.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena bārāṇasī isipatanaṃ migadāyo, yena pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:6.10.2: Addasaṃsu kho pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ;
pli-tv-kd1:6.10.4: “ayaṃ, āvuso, samaṇo gotamo āgacchati, bāhulliko padhānavibbhanto āvatto bāhullāya.
pli-tv-kd1:6.10.5: So neva abhivādetabbo, na paccuṭṭhātabbo, nāssa pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetabbaṃ;
pli-tv-kd1:6.10.6: api ca kho āsanaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, sace so ākaṅkhissati nisīdissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.11.1: Yathā yathā kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū upasaṅkamati tathā tathā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū nāsakkhiṃsu sakāya katikāya saṇṭhātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.11.2: Asaṇṭhahantā bhagavantaṃ paccuggantvā eko bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi, eko āsanaṃ paññapesi, eko pādodakaṃ, eko pādapīṭhaṃ, eko pādakaṭhalikaṃ upanikkhipi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.11.5: Apissu bhagavantaṃ nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācaranti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.12.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:6.12.2: “mā, bhikkhave, tathāgataṃ nāmena ca āvusovādena ca samudācaratha.
pli-tv-kd1:6.12.3: Arahaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgato sammāsambuddho, odahatha, bhikkhave, sotaṃ, amatamadhigataṃ, ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṃ dhammaṃ desemi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.12.5: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.12.6: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.13.1: Evaṃ vutte, pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.13.2: “tāyapi kho tvaṃ, āvuso gotama, iriyāya, tāya paṭipadāya, tāya dukkarakārikāya nevajjhagā uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṃ, kiṃ pana tvaṃ etarahi, bāhulliko padhānavibbhanto āvatto bāhullāya, adhigamissasi uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.14.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:6.14.2: “na, bhikkhave, tathāgato bāhulliko, na padhānavibbhanto, na āvatto bāhullāya;
pli-tv-kd1:6.14.4: Odahatha, bhikkhave, sotaṃ, amatamadhigataṃ ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṃ dhammaṃ desemi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.14.6: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.14.7: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.15.1: Dutiyampi kho pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ …pe….
pli-tv-kd1:6.15.2: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū etadavoca …pe….
pli-tv-kd1:6.15.3: Tatiyampi kho pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.15.4: “tāyapi kho tvaṃ, āvuso gotama, iriyāya, tāya paṭipadāya, tāya dukkarakārikāya nevajjhagā uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṃ, kiṃ pana tvaṃ etarahi, bāhulliko padhānavibbhanto āvatto bāhullāya, adhigamissasi uttari manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.16.1: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:6.16.2: “abhijānātha me no tumhe, bhikkhave, ito pubbe evarūpaṃ pabhāvitametan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.16.4: “Arahaṃ, bhikkhave, tathāgato sammāsambuddho, odahatha, bhikkhave, sotaṃ, amatamadhigataṃ ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṃ dhammaṃ desemi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.16.6: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.16.7: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.16.8: Asakkhi kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū saññāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.16.9: Atha kho pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ sussūsiṃsu, sotaṃ odahiṃsu, aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhāpesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.17.1: Atha kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:6.17.4: Yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito, yo cāyaṃ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito.
pli-tv-kd1:6.17.5: Ete kho, bhikkhave, ubho ante anupagamma majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
pli-tv-kd1:6.18.1: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
pli-tv-kd1:6.18.3: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.18.4: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā, cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
pli-tv-kd1:6.19.1: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.19.2: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṃ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṃ na labhati tampi dukkhaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.20.1: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.20.2: yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.21.1: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.21.2: yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho, cāgo, paṭinissaggo, mutti, anālayo.
pli-tv-kd1:6.22.1: Idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.22.3: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.23.1: Idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.23.2: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.23.3: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññātanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.24.1: Idaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.24.2: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabbanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.24.3: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahīnanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.25.1: Idaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.25.2: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabbanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.25.3: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikatanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.26.1: Idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.26.2: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabbanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.26.3: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.27.1: Yāvakīvañca me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ na suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, neva tāvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.28.1: Yato ca kho me, bhikkhave, imesu catūsu ariyasaccesu evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ ahosi, athāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsiṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.29.2: akuppā me vimutti, ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.29.3: Idamavoca bhagavā attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.29.4: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne āyasmato koṇḍaññassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:6.30.1: Pavattite ca pana bhagavatā dhammacakke, bhummā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.30.2: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ, appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.30.3: Bhummānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā cātumahārājikā devā saddamanussāvesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:6.30.4: cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tāvatiṃsā devā …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:6.30.10: “etaṃ bhagavatā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā kenaci vā lokasmin”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.31.1: Itiha tena khaṇena, tena layena, tena muhuttena yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.31.3: appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi, atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:6.31.4: Atha kho bhagavā imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:6.31.5: “aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño, aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.31.6: Iti hidaṃ āyasmato koṇḍaññassa “aññāsikoṇḍañño” tveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.32.1: Atha kho āyasmā aññāsikoṇḍañño diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṃkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:6.32.2: “labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.32.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.33.1: Atha kho bhagavā tadavasese bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya ovadi anusāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.33.2: Atha kho āyasmato ca vappassa āyasmato ca bhaddiyassa bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya ovadiyamānānaṃ anusāsiyamānānaṃ virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:6.34.1: Te diṭṭhadhammā pattadhammā viditadhammā pariyogāḷhadhammā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṃkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.34.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.34.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.35.1: Atha kho bhagavā tadavasese bhikkhū nīhārabhatto dhammiyā kathāya ovadi anusāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:6.35.2: Yaṃ tayo bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā āharanti, tena chabbaggo yāpeti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.36.1: Atha kho āyasmato ca mahānāmassa āyasmato ca assajissa bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya ovadiyamānānaṃ anusāsiyamānānaṃ virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:6.37.1: Te diṭṭhadhammā pattadhammā viditadhammā pariyogāḷhadhammā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṃkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.37.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.37.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.38.1: Atha kho bhagavā pañcavaggiye bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:6.38.3: Rūpañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe—
pli-tv-kd1:6.38.4: ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.38.5: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ anattā, tasmā rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati rūpe—
pli-tv-kd1:6.38.6: ‘evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.39.2: Vedanā ca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ vedanā ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca vedanāya—
pli-tv-kd1:6.39.3: ‘evaṃ me vedanā hotu, evaṃ me vedanā mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.39.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, vedanā anattā, tasmā vedanā ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati vedanāya—
pli-tv-kd1:6.39.5: ‘evaṃ me vedanā hotu, evaṃ me vedanā mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.2: Saññā ca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ saññā ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca saññāya—
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.3: ‘evaṃ me saññā hotu, evaṃ me saññā mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, saññā anattā, tasmā saññā ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati saññāya—
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.5: ‘evaṃ me saññā hotu, evaṃ me saññā mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.7: Saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissaṃsu, nayidaṃ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvatteyyuṃ, labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu—
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.8: ‘evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.9: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā anattā, tasmā saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvattanti, na ca labbhati saṅkhāresu—
pli-tv-kd1:6.40.10: ‘evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu, evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesun’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.41.2: Viññāṇañca hidaṃ, bhikkhave, attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ viññāṇaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca viññāṇe—
pli-tv-kd1:6.41.3: ‘evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ hotu, evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.41.4: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ anattā, tasmā viññāṇaṃ ābādhāya saṃvattati, na ca labbhati viññāṇe—
pli-tv-kd1:6.41.5: ‘evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ hotu, evaṃ me viññāṇaṃ mā ahosī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.42.1: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.42.3: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.42.5: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.42.6: etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.3: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.5: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.6: etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.10: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.12: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.13: etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.17: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.19: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.20: etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.24: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.26: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.43.27: etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:6.44.1: “Tasmātiha, bhikkhave, yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ rūpaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.44.2: netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.1: Yā kāci vedanā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā yā dūre santike vā, sabbā vedanā—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.2: netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.4: Yā kāci saññā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā yā dūre santike vā, sabbā saññā—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.5: netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.7: Ye keci saṅkhārā atītānāgatapaccuppannā ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā hīnā vā paṇītā vā ye dūre santike vā, sabbe saṅkhārā—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.8: netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.10: Yaṃ kiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:6.45.11: netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti—
pli-tv-kd1:6.46.1: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati, saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati;
pli-tv-kd1:6.46.4: vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti, ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.47.2: Attamanā pañcavaggiyā bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
pli-tv-kd1:6.47.3: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:6.47.4: Tena kho pana samayena cha loke arahanto honti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ yaso nāma kulaputto seṭṭhiputto sukhumālo hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.1.3: eko hemantiko, eko gimhiko, eko vassiko.
pli-tv-kd1:7.1.4: So vassike pāsāde cattāro māse nippurisehi tūriyehi paricārayamāno na heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ orohati.
pli-tv-kd1:7.2.1: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitassa samaṅgībhūtassa paricārayamānassa paṭikacceva niddā okkami, parijanassapi niddā okkami, sabbarattiyo ca telapadīpo jhāyati.
pli-tv-kd1:7.2.2: Atha kho yaso kulaputto paṭikacceva pabujjhitvā addasa sakaṃ parijanaṃ supantaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:7.2.3: aññissā kacche vīṇaṃ, aññissā kaṇṭhe mudiṅgaṃ, aññissā kacche āḷambaraṃ, aññaṃ vikesikaṃ, aññaṃ vikkheḷikaṃ, aññā vippalapantiyo, hatthappattaṃ susānaṃ maññe.
pli-tv-kd1:7.2.4: Disvānassa ādīnavo pāturahosi, nibbidāya cittaṃ saṇṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.2.5: Atha kho yaso kulaputto udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:7.3.1: Atha kho yaso kulaputto suvaṇṇapādukāyo ārohitvā yena nivesanadvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:7.3.3: “mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.3.4: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena nagaradvāraṃ tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:7.3.6: “mā yasassa kulaputtassa koci antarāyamakāsi agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.3.7: Atha kho yaso kulaputto yena isipatanaṃ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:7.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:7.4.2: Addasā kho bhagavā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna caṅkamā orohitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.4.3: Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavato avidūre udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd1:7.4.5: Atha kho bhagavā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:7.4.7: Ehi, yasa, nisīda, dhammaṃ te desessāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.5.2: “idaṃ kira anupaddutaṃ, idaṃ anupassaṭṭhan”ti haṭṭho udaggo suvaṇṇapādukāhi orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho yasassa kulaputtassa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:7.5.4: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ, kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.6.1: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ kallacittaṃ, muducittaṃ, vinīvaraṇacittaṃ, udaggacittaṃ, pasannacittaṃ, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā taṃ pakāsesi—
pli-tv-kd1:7.6.3: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd1:7.6.4: evameva yasassa kulaputtassa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:7.7.1: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa mātā pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ apassantī yena seṭṭhi gahapati tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:7.7.3: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati catuddisā assadūte uyyojetvā sāmaṃyeva yena isipatanaṃ migadāyo tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:7.7.4: Addasā kho seṭṭhi gahapati suvaṇṇapādukānaṃ nikkhepaṃ, disvāna taṃyeva anugamāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.8.1: Addasā kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna bhagavato etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:7.8.2: “yannūnāhaṃ tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhareyyaṃ yathā seṭṭhi gahapati idha nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ na passeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.8.3: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharesi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.9.1: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:7.9.3: “Tena hi, gahapati, nisīda, appeva nāma idha nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passeyyāsī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.9.5: “idheva kirāhaṃ nisinno idha nisinnaṃ yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ passissāmī”ti haṭṭho udaggo bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho seṭṭhissa gahapatissa bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ, kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.3: Yadā bhagavā aññāsi seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ kallacittaṃ, muducittaṃ, vinīvaraṇacittaṃ, udaggacittaṃ, pasannacittaṃ, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā, taṃ pakāsesi—
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.5: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.6: evameva seṭṭhissa gahapatissa tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.8: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṃkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.10: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya—
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.13: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammañca, bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.14: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.10.15: Sova loke paṭhamaṃ upāsako ahosi tevāciko.
pli-tv-kd1:7.11.1: Atha kho yasassa kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucci.
pli-tv-kd1:7.11.3: “yasassa kho kulaputtassa pituno dhamme desiyamāne yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:7.11.4: Abhabbo kho yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ, seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto;
pli-tv-kd1:7.11.6: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ paṭippassambhesi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.12.1: Addasā kho seṭṭhi gahapati yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ nisinnaṃ disvāna, yasaṃ kulaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:7.12.2: “mātā te, tāta yasa, paridevasokasamāpannā, dehi mātuyā jīvitan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.13.1: Atha kho yaso kulaputto bhagavantaṃ ullokesi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.13.2: Atha kho bhagavā seṭṭhiṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:7.13.3: “taṃ kiṃ maññasi, gahapati, yassa sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito seyyathāpi tayā, tassa yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:7.13.4: Bhabbo nu kho so, gahapati, hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:7.13.6: “Yasassa kho, gahapati, kulaputtassa sekkhena ñāṇena sekkhena dassanena dhammo diṭṭho vidito seyyathāpi tayā, tassa yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāviditaṃ bhūmiṃ paccavekkhantassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:7.13.7: Abhabbo kho, gahapati, yaso kulaputto hīnāyāvattitvā kāme paribhuñjituṃ seyyathāpi pubbe agārikabhūto”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.14.1: “Lābhā, bhante, yasassa kulaputtassa, suladdhaṃ, bhante, yasassa kulaputtassa, yathā yasassa kulaputtassa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuttaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:7.14.2: Adhivāsetu me, bhante, bhagavā ajjatanāya bhattaṃ yasena kulaputtena pacchāsamaṇenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.14.4: Atha kho seṭṭhi gahapati bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:7.15.1: Atha kho yaso kulaputto acirapakkante seṭṭhimhi gahapatimhi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:7.15.2: “labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.15.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:7.15.6: Tena kho pana samayena satta loke arahanto honti.
pli-tv-kd1:8.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā yasena pacchāsamaṇena yena seṭṭhissa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:8.1.2: Atha kho āyasmato yasassa mātā ca purāṇadutiyikā ca yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:8.2.1: Tāsaṃ bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:8.2.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ, kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:8.2.3: Yadā tā bhagavā aññāsi kallacittā, muducittā, vinīvaraṇacittā, udaggacittā, pasannacittā, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā taṃ pakāsesi—
pli-tv-kd1:8.2.5: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd1:8.2.6: evameva tāsaṃ tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:8.3.1: Tā diṭṭhadhammā pattadhammā viditadhammā pariyogāḷhadhammā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṃkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:8.3.3: etā mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāma, dhammañca, bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd1:8.3.4: Upāsikāyo no bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetā saraṇaṃ gatā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:8.3.5: Tā ca loke paṭhamaṃ upāsikā ahesuṃ tevācikā.
pli-tv-kd1:8.4.1: Atha kho āyasmato yasassa mātā ca pitā ca purāṇadutiyikā ca bhagavantañca āyasmantañca yasaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā, bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ, ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:8.4.2: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato yasassa mātarañca pitarañca purāṇadutiyikañca dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:9.1.1: Assosuṃ kho āyasmato yasassa cattāro gihisahāyakā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnaṃ kulānaṃ puttā—
pli-tv-kd1:9.1.3: yaso kira kulaputto kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitoti.
pli-tv-kd1:9.1.5: “na hi nūna so orako dhammavinayo, na sā orakā pabbajjā, yattha yaso kulaputto kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:9.2.1: Te yenāyasmā yaso tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ yasaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:9.2.2: Atha kho āyasmā yaso te cattāro gihisahāyake ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:9.2.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā yaso bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:9.2.4: “ime me, bhante, cattāro gihisahāyakā bārāṇasiyaṃ seṭṭhānuseṭṭhīnaṃ kulānaṃ puttā—
pli-tv-kd1:9.3.1: Tesaṃ bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:9.3.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:9.3.3: Yadā te bhagavā aññāsi kallacitte muducitte vinīvaraṇacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā, taṃ pakāsesi dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ maggaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:9.3.4: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd1:9.3.5: evameva tesaṃ tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:9.4.1: Te diṭṭhadhammā pattadhammā viditadhammā pariyogāḷhadhammā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṃkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:9.4.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:9.4.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:9.4.6: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya ovadi anusāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:9.4.7: Tesaṃ bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya ovadiyamānānaṃ anusāsiyamānānaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:9.4.8: Tena kho pana samayena ekādasa loke arahanto honti.
pli-tv-kd1:10.1.1: Assosuṃ kho āyasmato yasassa paññāsamattā gihisahāyakā jānapadā pubbānupubbakānaṃ kulānaṃ puttā—
pli-tv-kd1:10.1.2: yaso kira kulaputto kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitoti.
pli-tv-kd1:10.1.4: “na hi nūna so orako dhammavinayo, na sā orakā pabbajjā, yattha yaso kulaputto kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:10.2.1: Te yenāyasmā yaso tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ yasaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:10.2.2: Atha kho āyasmā yaso te paññāsamatte gihisahāyake ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:10.2.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā yaso bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:10.2.4: “ime me, bhante, paññāsamattā gihisahāyakā jānapadā pubbānupubbakānaṃ kulānaṃ puttā.
pli-tv-kd1:10.3.1: Tesaṃ bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:10.3.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:10.3.3: Yadā te bhagavā aññāsi kallacitte muducitte vinīvaraṇacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā, taṃ pakāsesi dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ maggaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:10.3.4: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd1:10.3.5: evameva tesaṃ tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:10.4.1: Te diṭṭhadhammā pattadhammā viditadhammā pariyogāḷhadhammā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṃkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:10.4.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:10.4.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:10.4.6: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū dhammiyā kathāya ovadi anusāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:10.4.7: Tesaṃ bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya ovadiyamānānaṃ anusāsiyamānānaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:10.4.8: Tena kho pana samayena ekasaṭṭhi loke arahanto honti.
pli-tv-kd1:11.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā te bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:11.1.2: “muttāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbapāsehi, ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
pli-tv-kd1:11.1.3: Tumhepi, bhikkhave, muttā sabbapāsehi, ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
pli-tv-kd1:11.1.4: Caratha, bhikkhave, cārikaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:11.1.6: Desetha, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetha.
pli-tv-kd1:11.1.7: Santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, bhavissanti dhammassa aññātāro.
pli-tv-kd1:11.1.8: Ahampi, bhikkhave, yena uruvelā senānigamo tenupasaṅkamissāmi dhammadesanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:11.2.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:11.2.19: “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
pli-tv-kd1:12.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū nānādisā nānājanapadā pabbajjāpekkhe ca upasampadāpekkhe ca ānenti—
pli-tv-kd1:12.1.3: Tattha bhikkhū ceva kilamanti pabbajjāpekkhā ca upasampadāpekkhā ca.
pli-tv-kd1:12.1.4: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:12.1.5: “etarahi kho bhikkhū nānādisā nānājanapadā pabbajjāpekkhe ca upasampadāpekkhe ca ānenti—
pli-tv-kd1:12.1.7: Tattha bhikkhū ceva kilamanti pabbajjāpekkhā ca upasampadāpekkhā ca.
pli-tv-kd1:12.1.9: tumheva dāni, bhikkhave, tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādethā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:12.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:12.2.2: “idha mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:12.2.3: etarahi kho bhikkhū nānādisā nānājanapadā pabbajjāpekkhe ca upasampadāpekkhe ca ānenti—
pli-tv-kd1:12.2.4: ‘bhagavā ne pabbājessati upasampādessatī’ti, Tattha bhikkhū ceva kilamanti pabbajjāpekkhā ca upasampadāpekkhā ca.
pli-tv-kd1:12.3.1: Yannūnāhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anujāneyyaṃ tumheva dāni, bhikkhave, tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādethāti, Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tumheva dāni tāsu tāsu disāsu tesu tesu janapadesu pabbājetha upasampādetha.
pli-tv-kd1:12.3.3: Paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārāpetvā, kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā, ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā, bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā, ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā, añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṃ vadehī’ti vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:12.4.10: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:13.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā vassaṃvuṭṭho bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:13.1.2: “mayhaṃ kho, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā yoniso sammappadhānā anuttarā vimutti anuppattā, anuttarā vimutti sacchikatā.
pli-tv-kd1:13.1.3: Tumhepi, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā yoniso sammappadhānā anuttaraṃ vimuttiṃ anupāpuṇātha, anuttaraṃ vimuttiṃ sacchikarothā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:13.2.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:13.2.11: “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyi.
pli-tv-kd1:14.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena uruvelā tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:14.1.2: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataro vanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:14.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena tiṃsamattā bhaddavaggiyā sahāyakā sapajāpatikā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe paricārenti.
pli-tv-kd1:14.1.6: Atha kho sā vesī tesu pamattesu paricārentesu bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya palāyittha.
pli-tv-kd1:14.2.1: Atha kho te sahāyakā sahāyakassa veyyāvaccaṃ karontā, taṃ itthiṃ gavesantā, taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ āhiṇḍantā addasaṃsu bhagavantaṃ aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:14.2.2: Disvāna yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:14.2.5: “Idha mayaṃ, bhante, tiṃsamattā bhaddavaggiyā sahāyakā sapajāpatikā imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe paricārimhā.
pli-tv-kd1:14.2.8: Atha kho sā, bhante, vesī amhesu pamattesu paricārentesu bhaṇḍaṃ ādāya palāyittha.
pli-tv-kd1:14.2.9: Te mayaṃ, bhante, sahāyakā sahāyakassa veyyāvaccaṃ karontā, taṃ itthiṃ gavesantā, imaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ āhiṇḍāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:14.3.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha vo, kumārā, katamaṃ nu kho tumhākaṃ varaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:14.3.2: yaṃ vā tumhe itthiṃ gaveseyyātha, yaṃ vā attānaṃ gaveseyyāthā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:14.3.3: “Etadeva, bhante, amhākaṃ varaṃ yaṃ mayaṃ attānaṃ gaveseyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:14.3.4: “Tena hi vo, kumārā, nisīdatha, dhammaṃ vo desessāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:14.3.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhaddavaggiyā sahāyakā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:14.4.1: Tesaṃ bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:14.4.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:14.4.3: Yadā te bhagavā aññāsi kallacitte muducitte vinīvaraṇacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā, taṃ pakāsesi dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ maggaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:14.4.4: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd1:14.4.5: evameva tesaṃ tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:14.5.1: Te diṭṭhadhammā pattadhammā viditadhammā pariyogāḷhadhammā tiṇṇavicikicchā vigatakathaṃkathā vesārajjappattā aparappaccayā satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:14.5.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:14.5.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena uruvelā tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:15.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelāyaṃ tayo jaṭilā paṭivasanti—
pli-tv-kd1:15.1.4: Tesu uruvelakassapo jaṭilo pañcannaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako hoti, vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho.
pli-tv-kd1:15.1.5: Nadīkassapo jaṭilo tiṇṇaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako hoti, vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho.
pli-tv-kd1:15.1.6: Gayākassapo jaṭilo dvinnaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako hoti, vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho.
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā yena uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.2: “sace te, kassapa, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṃ agyāgāre”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.3: “Na kho me, mahāsamaṇa, garu, caṇḍettha nāgarājā iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso, so taṃ mā viheṭhesī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.5: “sace te, kassapa, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṃ agyāgāre”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.6: “Na kho me, mahāsamaṇa, garu, caṇḍettha nāgarājā iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso, so taṃ mā viheṭhesī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.7: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.8: “sace te, kassapa, agaru, vaseyyāma ekarattaṃ agyāgāre”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.9: “Na kho me, mahāsamaṇa, garu, caṇḍettha nāgarājā iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso, so taṃ mā viheṭhesī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.2.10: “Appeva maṃ na viheṭheyya, iṅgha tvaṃ, kassapa, anujānāhi agyāgāran”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
pli-tv-kd1:15.3.2: Addasā kho so nāgo bhagavantaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ, disvāna dummano padhūpāyi.
pli-tv-kd1:15.3.4: “yannūnāhaṃ imassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṃsañca nhāruñca aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā tathārūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharitvā padhūpāyi.
pli-tv-kd1:15.4.2: Atha kho so nāgo makkhaṃ asahamāno pajjali.
pli-tv-kd1:15.4.4: Ubhinnaṃ sajotibhūtānaṃ agyāgāraṃ ādittaṃ viya hoti sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:15.4.5: Atha kho te jaṭilā agyāgāraṃ parivāretvā evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd1:15.5.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena tassa nāgassa anupahacca chaviñca cammañca maṃsañca nhāruñca aṭṭhiñca aṭṭhimiñjañca tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyitvā patte pakkhipitvā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa dassesi—
pli-tv-kd1:15.5.2: “ayaṃ te, kassapa, nāgo pariyādinno assa tejasā tejo”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.5.4: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma caṇḍassa nāgarājassa iddhimato āsivisassa ghoravisassa tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:15.7.13: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavato iminā iddhipāṭihāriyena abhippasanno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:16.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa assamassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:16.1.2: Atha kho cattāro mahārājāno abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā catuddisā aṭṭhaṃsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā.
pli-tv-kd1:16.2.1: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:16.2.3: Ke nu kho te, mahāsamaṇa, abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena tvaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ abhivādetvā catuddisā aṭṭhaṃsu seyyathāpi mahantā aggikkhandhā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:16.2.4: “Ete kho, kassapa, cattāro mahārājāno yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkamiṃsu dhammassavanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:16.2.6: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma cattāropi mahārājāno upasaṅkamissanti dhammassavanāya, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:16.2.7: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:17.1.1: Atha kho sakko devānamindo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho, purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
pli-tv-kd1:17.2.1: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:17.2.3: Ko nu kho so, mahāsamaṇa, abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena tvaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho, purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:17.2.4: “Eso kho, kassapa, sakko devānamindo yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami dhammassavanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:17.2.6: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo upasaṅkamissati dhammassavanāya, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:17.2.7: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:18.1.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho, purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
pli-tv-kd1:18.2.1: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:18.2.3: Ko nu kho so, mahāsamaṇa, abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ obhāsetvā yena tvaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi seyyathāpi mahāaggikkhandho, purimāhi vaṇṇanibhāhi abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:18.2.4: “Eso kho, kassapa, brahmā sahampati yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami dhammassavanāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:18.2.6: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma brahmāpi sahampati upasaṅkamissati dhammassavanāya, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:18.2.7: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:19.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito hoti, kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamitukāmā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:19.1.3: “etarahi kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito, kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamissanti.
pli-tv-kd1:19.1.4: Sace mahāsamaṇo mahājanakāye iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karissati, mahāsamaṇassa lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhissati, mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati.
pli-tv-kd1:19.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:19.2.2: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:19.2.4: Kiṃ nu kho, mahāsamaṇa, hiyyo nāgamāsi?
pli-tv-kd1:19.2.7: Khādanīyassa ca bhojanīyassa ca te paṭivīso ṭhapito”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:19.3.2: ‘etarahi kho me mahāyañño paccupaṭṭhito, kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya abhikkamissanti, sace mahāsamaṇo mahājanakāye iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karissati, mahāsamaṇassa lābhasakkāro abhivaḍḍhissati, mama lābhasakkāro parihāyissati, aho nūna mahāsamaṇo svātanāya nāgaccheyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:19.4.1: So kho ahaṃ, kassapa, tava cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato piṇḍapātaṃ āharitvā anotattadahe paribhuñjitvā tattheva divāvihāraṃ akāsin”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:19.4.3: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma cetasāpi cittaṃ pajānissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:19.4.4: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:20.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavato paṃsukūlaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.1.4: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.1.8: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.2.3: Atha kho kakudhe adhivatthā devatā bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṃ onāmesi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.2.7: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.3.1: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.3.3: Kiṃ nu kho, mahāsamaṇa, nāyaṃ pubbe idha pokkharaṇī, sāyaṃ idha pokkharaṇī.
pli-tv-kd1:20.3.6: Nayimassa kakudhassa pubbe sākhā onatā, sāyaṃ sākhā onatā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.4-5.4: Atha kho, kassapa, sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya pāṇinā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇitvā maṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.4-5.6: Sāyaṃ, kassapa, amanussena pāṇinā khaṇitā pokkharaṇī.
pli-tv-kd1:20.4-5.9: Atha kho, kassapa, sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.4-5.14: Atha kho, kassapa, kakudhe adhivatthā devatā mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya sākhaṃ onāmesi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.4-5.19: Atha kho, kassapa, sakko devānamindo mama cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya mahatiṃ silaṃ upanikkhipi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.6.2: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma sakkopi devānamindo veyyāvaccaṃ karissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.6.3: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:20.7.1: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocesi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.7.3: “Gaccha tvaṃ, kassapa, āyāmahan”ti uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā “jambudīpo” paññāyati, tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:20.8.1: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ agyāgāre nisinnaṃ, disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.8.3: Ahaṃ tayā paṭhamataraṃ pakkanto, so tvaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.9.1: “Idhāhaṃ, kassapa, taṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā ‘jambudīpo’ paññāyati, tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno.
pli-tv-kd1:20.9.2: Idaṃ kho, kassapa, jambuphalaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ gandhasampannaṃ rasasampannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:20.9.4: “Alaṃ, mahāsamaṇa, tvaṃyeva taṃ arahasi, tvaṃyeva taṃ paribhuñjāhī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.9.6: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma maṃ paṭhamataraṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā ‘jambudīpo’ paññāyati, tato phalaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.9.7: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapassa jaṭilassa bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tasmiṃyeva vanasaṇḍe vihāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:20.10.1: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocesi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.10.3: “Gaccha tvaṃ, kassapa, āyāmahan”ti uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ uyyojetvā yāya jambuyā “jambudīpo” paññāyati, tassā avidūre ambo …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:20.10.6: tāvatiṃsaṃ gantvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:20.10.7: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ agyāgāre nisinnaṃ, disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.10.9: Ahaṃ tayā paṭhamataraṃ pakkanto, so tvaṃ paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.11.1: “Idhāhaṃ, kassapa, taṃ uyyojetvā tāvatiṃsaṃ gantvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisinno.
pli-tv-kd1:20.11.2: Idaṃ kho, kassapa, pāricchattakapupphaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ gandhasampannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:20.11.4: “Alaṃ, mahāsamaṇa, tvaṃyeva taṃ arahasi, tvaṃyeva taṃ gaṇhā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.11.6: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma maṃ paṭhamataraṃ uyyojetvā tāvatiṃsaṃ gantvā pāricchattakapupphaṃ gahetvā paṭhamataraṃ āgantvā agyāgāre nisīdissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.12.1: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritukāmā na sakkonti kaṭṭhāni phāletuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:20.12.3: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo, yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma kaṭṭhāni phāletun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.12.4: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.12.9: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma kaṭṭhānipi phāliyissanti, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.13.1: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritukāmā na sakkonti aggiṃ ujjaletuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:20.13.3: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo, yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma aggiṃ ujjaletun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.13.4: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.13.9: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma aggīpi ujjaliyissanti, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.14.1: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā aggiṃ paricaritvā na sakkonti aggiṃ vijjhāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:20.14.3: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo, yathā mayaṃ na sakkoma aggiṃ vijjhāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.14.4: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.14.9: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma aggīpi vijjhāyissanti, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.15.1: Tena kho pana samayena te jaṭilā sītāsu hemantikāsu rattīsu antaraṭṭhakāsu himapātasamaye najjā nerañjarāya ummujjantipi, nimujjantipi, ummujjananimujjanampi karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.15.2: Atha kho bhagavā pañcamattāni mandāmukhisatāni abhinimmini, yattha te jaṭilā uttaritvā visibbesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:20.15.4: “nissaṃsayaṃ kho mahāsamaṇassa iddhānubhāvo, yathayimā mandāmukhiyo nimmitā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.15.6: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma tāva bahū mandāmukhiyopi abhinimminissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.16.1: Tena kho pana samayena mahā akālamegho pāvassi, mahā udakavāhako sañjāyi.
pli-tv-kd1:20.16.2: Yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati, so padeso udakena na otthaṭo hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.16.4: “yannūnāhaṃ samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkameyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.16.5: Atha kho bhagavā samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:20.16.7: “mā heva kho mahāsamaṇo udakena vūḷho ahosī”ti nāvāya sambahulehi jaṭilehi saddhiṃ yasmiṃ padese bhagavā viharati taṃ padesaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:20.16.8: Addasā kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ samantā udakaṃ ussāretvā majjhe reṇuhatāya bhūmiyā caṅkamantaṃ, disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.16.13: “mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, yatra hi nāma udakampi na pavāhissati, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.17.3: ‘mahiddhiko kho mahāsamaṇo mahānubhāvo, na tveva ca kho arahā yathā ahan’ti;
pli-tv-kd1:20.17.5: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelakassapaṃ jaṭilaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.17.6: “neva ca kho tvaṃ, kassapa, arahā, nāpi arahattamaggasamāpanno.
pli-tv-kd1:20.17.7: Sāpi te paṭipadā natthi, yāya tvaṃ arahā vā assasi, arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpanno”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.17.8: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.17.9: “labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.18.1: “Tvaṃ khosi, kassapa, pañcannaṃ jaṭilasatānaṃ nāyako vināyako aggo pamukho pāmokkho.
pli-tv-kd1:20.18.2: Tepi tāva apalokehi, yathā te maññissanti tathā te karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.18.3: Atha kho uruvelakassapo jaṭilo yena te jaṭilā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te jaṭile etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.18.4: “icchāmahaṃ, bho, mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ, yathā bhavanto maññanti tathā karontū”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.18.5: “Cirapaṭikā mayaṃ, bho, mahāsamaṇe abhippasannā, sace bhavaṃ, mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ carissati, sabbeva mayaṃ mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ carissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.19.1: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:20.19.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.19.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.20.1: Addasā kho nadīkassapo jaṭilo kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake vuyhamāne, disvānassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.20.5: Sāmañca tīhi jaṭilasatehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā uruvelakassapo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ uruvelakassapaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.21.1: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:20.21.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.21.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.22.1: Addasā kho gayākassapo jaṭilo kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake vuyhamāne, disvānassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:20.22.5: Sāmañca dvīhi jaṭilasatehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā uruvelakassapo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ uruvelakassapaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:20.23.1: Atha kho te jaṭilā kesamissaṃ jaṭāmissaṃ khārikājamissaṃ aggihutamissaṃ udake pavāhetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:20.23.2: “labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.23.4: “svākkhāto dhammo, caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:20.24.1: Bhagavato adhiṭṭhānena pañca kaṭṭhasatāni na phāliyiṃsu, phāliyiṃsu;
pli-tv-kd1:21.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena gayāsīsaṃ tena pakkāmi mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ bhikkhusahassena sabbeheva purāṇajaṭilehi.
pli-tv-kd1:21.1.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati gayāsīse saddhiṃ bhikkhusahassena.
pli-tv-kd1:21.2.4: Cakkhu ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, cakkhusamphasso āditto, yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:21.2.6: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.1: Sotaṃ ādittaṃ, saddā ādittā, sotaviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, sotasamphasso āditto, yamidaṃ sotasamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.3: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.4: Ghānaṃ ādittaṃ, gandhā ādittā, ghānaviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, ghānasamphasso āditto, yamidaṃ ghānasamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.6: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.7: Jivhā ādittā, rasā ādittā, jivhāviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ jivhāsamphasso āditto, yamidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.9: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.10: Kāyo āditto, phoṭṭhabbā ādittā, kāyaviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ kāyasamphasso āditto, yamidaṃ kāyasamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.12: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.13: Mano āditto, dhammā ādittā, manoviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ manosamphasso āditto, yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi ādittaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:21.3.15: Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:21.4.1: Evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rūpesupi nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tasmimpi nibbindati.
pli-tv-kd1:21.4.6: manasmimpi nibbindati, dhammesupi nibbindati, manoviññāṇepi nibbindati, manosamphassepi nibbindati, yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tasmimpi nibbindati,
pli-tv-kd1:21.4.7: nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati, vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:21.4.8: Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:21.4.9: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:22.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā gayāsīse yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena rājagahaṃ tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi, mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ bhikkhusahassena sabbeheva purāṇajaṭilehi.
pli-tv-kd1:22.1.2: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena rājagahaṃ tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:22.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati laṭṭhivane suppatiṭṭhe cetiye.
pli-tv-kd1:22.2.1: Assosi kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro—
pli-tv-kd1:22.2.2: “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito rājagahaṃ anuppatto rājagahe viharati laṭṭhivane suppatiṭṭhe cetiye.
pli-tv-kd1:22.2.3: Taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato—
pli-tv-kd1:22.2.4: itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā.
pli-tv-kd1:22.2.5: So imaṃ lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.2.6: So dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.2.7: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.3.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro dvādasanahutehi māgadhikehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:22.3.2: Tepi kho dvādasanahutā māgadhikā brāhmaṇagahapatikā appekacce bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, appekacce bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsu, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, appekacce yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, appekacce bhagavato santike nāmagottaṃ sāvetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, appekacce tuṇhībhūtā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:22.4.1: Atha kho tesaṃ dvādasanahutānaṃ māgadhikānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.4.2: “kiṃ nu kho mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape brahmacariyaṃ carati, udāhu uruvelakassapo mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:22.4.3: Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ dvādasanahutānaṃ māgadhikānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya āyasmantaṃ uruvelakassapaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.4.8: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca,
pli-tv-kd1:22.4.11: Tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañjin”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.5.8: Tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañjin”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.6.1: Atha kho āyasmā uruvelakassapo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:22.6.4: Atha kho tesaṃ dvādasanahutānaṃ māgadhikānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.7.1: Atha kho bhagavā tesaṃ dvādasanahutānaṃ māgadhikānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:22.7.2: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:22.7.3: Yadā te bhagavā aññāsi kallacitte muducitte vinīvaraṇacitte udaggacitte pasannacitte, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā, taṃ pakāsesi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.8.1: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
pli-tv-kd1:22.8.2: evameva ekādasanahutānaṃ māgadhikānaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ bimbisārappamukhānaṃ tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.9.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṃkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:22.9.2: “pubbe me, bhante, kumārassa sato pañca assāsakā ahesuṃ, te me etarahi samiddhā.
pli-tv-kd1:22.9.3: Pubbe me, bhante, kumārassa sato etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.9.4: ‘aho vata maṃ rajje abhisiñceyyun’ti, ayaṃ kho me, bhante, paṭhamo assāsako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho.
pli-tv-kd1:22.9.5: ‘Tassa ca me vijitaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho okkameyyā’ti, ayaṃ kho me, bhante, dutiyo assāsako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho.
pli-tv-kd1:22.10.1: ‘Tañcāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāseyyan’ti, ayaṃ kho me, bhante, tatiyo assāsako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho.
pli-tv-kd1:22.10.2: ‘So ca me bhagavā dhammaṃ deseyyā’ti, ayaṃ kho me, bhante, catuttho assāsako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho.
pli-tv-kd1:22.10.3: ‘Tassa cāhaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ ājāneyyan’ti, ayaṃ kho me, bhante, pañcamo assāsako ahosi, so me etarahi samiddho.
pli-tv-kd1:22.10.4: Pubbe me, bhante, kumārassa sato ime pañca assāsakā ahesuṃ, te me etarahi samiddhā.
pli-tv-kd1:22.11.2: Seyyathāpi, bhante, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya—‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
pli-tv-kd1:22.11.4: Esāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammañca, bhikkhusaṃghañca.
pli-tv-kd1:22.11.5: Upāsakaṃ maṃ, bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gataṃ, adhivāsetu ca me, bhante, bhagavā, svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.12.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:22.12.2: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro tassā rattiyā accayena paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṃ ārocāpesi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.12.4: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ pāvisi mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ bhikkhusahassena sabbeheva purāṇajaṭilehi.
pli-tv-kd1:22.13.1: Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṃghassa purato purato gacchati imā gāthāyo gāyamāno—
pli-tv-kd1:22.14.2: “abhirūpo vatāyaṃ māṇavako, dassanīyo vatāyaṃ māṇavako, pāsādiko vatāyaṃ māṇavako.
pli-tv-kd1:22.14.4: Evaṃ vutte, sakko devānamindo te manusse gāthāya ajjhabhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.15.1: Atha kho bhagavā yena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṃghena.
pli-tv-kd1:22.15.2: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappetvā sampavāretvā bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ onītapattapāṇiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:22.16.1: Ekamantaṃ nisinnassa kho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.16.3: Yaṃ assa gāmato neva atidūre na accāsanne, gamanāgamanasampannaṃ, atthikānaṃ atthikānaṃ manussānaṃ abhikkamanīyaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ, rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ vijanavātaṃ, manussarāhasseyyakaṃ, paṭisallānasāruppan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.17.1: Atha kho rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.17.2: “idaṃ kho amhākaṃ veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ gāmato neva atidūre na accāsanne gamanāgamanasampannaṃ atthikānaṃ atthikānaṃ manussānaṃ abhikkamanīyaṃ divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ vijanavātaṃ manussarāhasseyyakaṃ paṭisallānasāruppaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:22.17.3: Yannūnāhaṃ veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṃghassa dadeyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.18.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro sovaṇṇamayaṃ bhiṅkāraṃ gahetvā bhagavato oṇojesi—
pli-tv-kd1:22.18.2: “etāhaṃ, bhante, veḷuvanaṃ uyyānaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṃghassa dammī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:22.18.4: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:22.18.5: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:23.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sañcayo paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṃ aḍḍhateyyehi paribbājakasatehi.
pli-tv-kd1:23.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāriputtamoggallānā sañcaye paribbājake brahmacariyaṃ caranti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.1.4: “yo paṭhamaṃ amataṃ adhigacchati, so itarassa ārocetū”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.2.1: Atha kho āyasmā assaji pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena, okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno.
pli-tv-kd1:23.2.2: Addasā kho sāriputto paribbājako āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhuṃ iriyāpathasampannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:23.2.4: “ye vata loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhu aññataro.
pli-tv-kd1:23.2.6: ‘kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī’”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:23.3.2: “akālo kho imaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchituṃ, antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho piṇḍāya carati.
pli-tv-kd1:23.3.3: Yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ, atthikehi upaññātaṃ maggan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.3.4: Atha kho āyasmā assaji rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya paṭikkami.
pli-tv-kd1:23.3.5: Atha kho sāriputtopi paribbājako yenāyasmā assaji tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā assajinā saddhiṃ sammodi, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:23.3.6: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho sāriputto paribbājako āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:23.3.7: “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
pli-tv-kd1:23.3.8: Kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:23.4.1: “Atthāvuso, mahāsamaṇo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito, tāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajito, so ca me bhagavā satthā, tassa cāhaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ rocemī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.4.3: “Ahaṃ kho, āvuso, navo acirapabbajito, adhunāgato imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, na tāhaṃ sakkomi vitthārena dhammaṃ desetuṃ, api ca te saṃkhittena atthaṃ vakkhāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.4.4: Atha kho sāriputto paribbājako āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:23.5.1: Atha kho āyasmā assaji sāriputtassa paribbājakassa imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ abhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:23.5.6: Atha kho sāriputtassa paribbājakassa imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ sutvā virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
pli-tv-kd1:23.6.1: Atha kho sāriputto paribbājako yena moggallāno paribbājako tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:23.6.2: Addasā kho moggallāno paribbājako sāriputtaṃ paribbājakaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ, disvāna sāriputtaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:23.6.3: “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
pli-tv-kd1:23.6.4: Kacci no tvaṃ, āvuso, amataṃ adhigato”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.1: “Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, addasaṃ assajiṃ bhikkhuṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhuṃ iriyāpathasampannaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.3: ‘ye vata loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ayaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhu aññataro.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.5: kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.7: ‘akālo kho imaṃ bhikkhuṃ pucchituṃ antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho piṇḍāya carati, yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ atthikehi upaññātaṃ maggan’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.8: Atha kho, āvuso, assaji bhikkhu rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātaṃ ādāya paṭikkami.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.9: Atha khvāhaṃ, āvuso, yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamiṃ, upasaṅkamitvā assajinā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ sammodiṃ, sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsiṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.10: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho ahaṃ, āvuso, assajiṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.11: ‘vippasannāni kho te, āvuso, indriyāni, parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.12: Kaṃsi tvaṃ, āvuso, uddissa pabbajito, ko vā te satthā, kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī’ti?
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.13: ‘Atthāvuso, mahāsamaṇo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito, tāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa pabbajito, so ca me bhagavā satthā, tassa cāhaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ rocemī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.15: ‘Ahaṃ kho, āvuso, navo acirapabbajito adhunāgato imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, na tāhaṃ sakkomi vitthārena dhammaṃ desetuṃ, api ca te saṃkhittena atthaṃ vakkhāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.16: Atha khvāhaṃ, āvuso, assajiṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocaṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:23.7-9.22: Atha kho, āvuso, assaji bhikkhu imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ abhāsi—
