pli-tv-kd1:37.13.2: Āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, ūnadasavasso hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:37.13.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na upasampādetabbaṃ, na nissayo dātabbo, na sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo. (13)
pli-tv-kd1:37.14.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:37.14.2: Āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, dasavasso vā hoti atirekadasavasso vā—
pli-tv-kd1:37.14.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā upasampādetabbaṃ, nissayo dātabbo, sāmaṇero upaṭṭhāpetabbo”ti. (14)
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena yo so aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṃ āropetvā taṃyeva titthāyatanaṃ saṅkami.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.4: “Yo so, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo upajjhāyena sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno upajjhāyassa vādaṃ āropetvā taṃyeva titthāyatanaṃ saṅkanto, so āgato na upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.1.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, aññopi aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati pabbajjaṃ, ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ, tassa cattāro māse parivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.2.2: paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṃ vadehī’ti vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.1: Tena, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbena saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.2: ‘ahaṃ, bhante, aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.3: Sohaṃ, bhante, saṃghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.8: Ayaṃ itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.9: So saṃghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.3.10: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ saṃgho itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsaṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhati upasampadaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.3: So saṃghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.4: Saṃgho itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsaṃ deti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.5: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāsassa dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.7: Dinno saṃghena itthannāmassa aññatitthiyapubbassa cattāro māse parivāso.
pli-tv-kd1:38.4.8: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.1: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti, evaṃ anārādhako.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo atikālena gāmaṃ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.5.5: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo vesiyāgocaro vā hoti, vidhavāgocaro vā hoti, thullakumārikāgocaro vā hoti, paṇḍakagocaro vā hoti, bhikkhunigocaro vā hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni, tattha na dakkho hoti, na analaso, na tatrupāyāya vīmaṃsāya samannāgato, na alaṃ kātuṃ, na alaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.6.3: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo na tibbacchando hoti uddese, paripucchāya, adhisīle, adhicitte, adhipaññāya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yassa titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa avaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṃghassa vā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.2: Yassa vā pana titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṃghassa vā vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.4: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo anārādhako hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.7.5: Evaṃ anārādhako kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo āgato na upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo nātikālena gāmaṃ pavisati nātidivā paṭikkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:38.8.4: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo na vesiyāgocaro hoti, na vidhavāgocaro hoti, na thullakumārikāgocaro hoti, na paṇḍakagocaro hoti, na bhikkhunigocaro hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yāni tāni sabrahmacārīnaṃ uccāvacāni karaṇīyāni, tattha dakkho hoti, analaso, tatrupāyāya vīmaṃsāya samannāgato, alaṃ kātuṃ, alaṃ saṃvidhātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.9.3: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo tibbacchando hoti uddese, paripucchāya, adhisīle, adhicitte, adhipaññāya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo yassa titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa avaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṃghassa vā avaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.2: Yassa vā pana titthāyatanā saṅkanto hoti, tassa satthuno tassa diṭṭhiyā tassa khantiyā tassa ruciyā tassa ādāyassa vaṇṇe bhaññamāne kupito hoti anattamano anabhiraddho, buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṃghassa vā vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attamano hoti udaggo abhiraddho.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.4: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo ārādhako hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:38.10.5: Evaṃ ārādhako kho, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo āgato upasampādetabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.1: Sace, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyapubbo naggo āgacchati, upajjhāyamūlakaṃ cīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.2: Sace acchinnakeso āgacchati, saṃgho apaloketabbo bhaṇḍukammāya.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.3: Ye te, bhikkhave, aggikā jaṭilakā, te āgatā upasampādetabbā, na tesaṃ parivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.6: Sace, bhikkhave, jātiyā sākiyo aññatitthiyapubbo āgacchati, so āgato upasampādetabbo, na tassa parivāso dātabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:38.11.7: Imāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ñātīnaṃ āveṇikaṃ parihāraṃ dammī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena magadhesu pañca ābādhā ussannā honti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.3: Manussā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhā jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadanti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.1.6: rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṃgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.1: “Ahaṃ khvayyo, bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṃgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.4: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.6: Tattha bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahissanti, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.7: Atha kho te manussā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:39.2.9: Te bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahiṃsu jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bahū gilāne bhikkhū upaṭṭhahantā yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharanti—
pli-tv-kd1:39.3.3: Jīvakopi komārabhacco bahū gilāne bhikkhū tikicchanto aññataraṃ rājakiccaṃ parihāpesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.1: Aññataropi puriso pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭho jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.3: “Ahaṃ khvayyo, bahukicco, bahukaraṇīyo, rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṃgho;
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.5: “Sabbaṃ sāpateyyañca te, ācariya, hotu, ahañca te dāso;
pli-tv-kd1:39.4.7: “Ahaṃ khvayyo, bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo, rājā ca me māgadho seniyo bimbisāro upaṭṭhātabbo itthāgārañca buddhappamukho ca bhikkhusaṃgho, nāhaṃ sakkomi tikicchitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.2: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.4: Tattha bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahissanti, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchissati.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.6: Atha kho so puriso bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.8: Taṃ bhikkhū ceva upaṭṭhahiṃsu, jīvako ca komārabhacco tikicchi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.10: Addasā kho jīvako komārabhacco taṃ purisaṃ vibbhantaṃ, disvāna taṃ purisaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.5.14: Atha kho so puriso jīvakassa komārabhaccassa etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.2: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.3: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:39.6.5: “sādhu, bhante, ayyā pañcahi ābādhehi phuṭṭhaṃ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.1: Atha kho bhagavā jīvakaṃ komārabhaccaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.2: Atha kho jīvako komārabhacco bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:39.7.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccanto kupito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.2: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro senānāyake mahāmatte āṇāpesi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.1.4: “Evaṃ, devā”ti kho senānāyakā mahāmattā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa paccassosuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.1: Atha kho abhiññātānaṃ abhiññātānaṃ yodhānaṃ etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.2: “mayaṃ kho yuddhābhinandino gacchantā pāpañca karoma, bahuñca apuññaṃ pasavāma.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.3: Kena nu kho mayaṃ upāyena pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.5: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.6: Sace kho mayaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyāma, evaṃ mayaṃ pāpā ca virameyyāma kalyāṇañca kareyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.2.7: Atha kho te yodhā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.2: “kiṃ nu kho, bhaṇe, itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca yodhā na dissantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.3: “Itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca, sāmi, yodhā bhikkhūsu pabbajitā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.6: Senānāyakā mahāmattā rañño māgadhassa seniyassa bimbisārassa etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.7: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vohārike mahāmatte pucchi—
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.8: “yo, bhaṇe, rājabhaṭaṃ pabbājeti, kiṃ so pasavatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:40.3.9: “Upajjhāyassa, deva, sīsaṃ chetabbaṃ, anussāvakassa jivhā uddharitabbā, gaṇassa upaḍḍhaphāsukā bhañjitabbā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.1: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.5: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā rājabhaṭaṃ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.6: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ seniyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.7: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:40.4.8: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena coro aṅgulimālo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.2: Manussā passitvā ubbijjantipi, uttasantipi, palāyantipi, aññenapi gacchanti, aññenapi mukhaṃ karonti, dvārampi thakenti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhajabandhaṃ coraṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:41.1.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena anuññātaṃ hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.2: “ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṃ;
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.3: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso corikaṃ katvā kārāya baddho hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.1.5: So kāraṃ bhinditvā palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.7: ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṃ;
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.8: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.10: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:42.2.11: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kārabhedakaṃ coraṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso corikaṃ katvā palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.2: So ca rañño antepure likhito hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.9: Anuññātaṃ raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṃ, svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.11: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:43.1.12: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā likhitakaṃ coraṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:44.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso kasāhato katadaṇḍakammo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:44.1.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā kasāhataṃ katadaṇḍakammaṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:45.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso lakkhaṇāhato katadaṇḍakammo bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:45.1.3: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā lakkhaṇāhataṃ katadaṇḍakammaṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro puriso iṇāyiko palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.8: ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṃ;
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.9: svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:46.1.13: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā iṇāyikaṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro dāso palāyitvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.6: “māyyo, evaṃ avacuttha, anuññātaṃ raññā māgadhena seniyena bimbisārena ‘ye samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajanti, na te labbhā kiñci kātuṃ, svākkhāto dhammo, carantu brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.8: “abhayūvarā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā, nayime labbhā kiñci kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:47.1.9: Kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dāsaṃ pabbājessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro kammārabhaṇḍu mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.1.2: Atha kho tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitaro taṃ kammārabhaṇḍuṃ vicinantā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhū pucchiṃsu—
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.1: Atha kho tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitaro taṃ kammārabhaṇḍuṃ vicinantā bhikkhūsu pabbajitaṃ disvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.3: Jānaṃyeva āhaṃsu—‘na jānāmā’ti, passaṃyeva āhaṃsu—‘na passāmā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tassa kammārabhaṇḍussa mātāpitūnaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:48.2.6: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena rājagahe sattarasavaggiyā dārakā sahāyakā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.4: “kena nu kho upāyena upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.6: “sace kho upāli lekhaṃ sikkheyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.8: “sace kho upāli lekhaṃ sikkhissati, aṅguliyo dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.1.9: Sace kho upāli gaṇanaṃ sikkheyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.1: “sace kho upāli gaṇanaṃ sikkhissati, urassa dukkho bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.2: Sace kho upāli rūpaṃ sikkheyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.4: “sace kho upāli rūpaṃ sikkhissati, akkhīni dukkhā bhavissanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.5: Ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.2.6: Sace kho upāli samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyya, evaṃ kho upāli amhākaṃ accayena sukhañca jīveyya, na ca kilameyyā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.1: Assosi kho upālidārako mātāpitūnaṃ imaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.2: Atha kho upālidārako yena te dārakā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā te dārake etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.4: “Sace kho tvaṃ, ayya, pabbajissasi, evaṃ mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.3.5: Atha kho te dārakā ekamekassa mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.5: Sace yāgu bhavissati pivissatha, sace bhattaṃ bhavissati bhuñjissatha, sace khādanīyaṃ bhavissati khādissatha;
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.6: no ce bhavissati yāgu vā bhattaṃ vā khādanīyaṃ vā, piṇḍāya caritvā bhuñjissathā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.4.7: Evampi kho te bhikkhū bhikkhūhi vuccamānā rodantiyeva “yāguṃ detha, bhattaṃ detha, khādanīyaṃ dethā”ti;
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.1: Assosi kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya dārakasaddaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:49.5.8: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādessanti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.1: Ūnavīsativasso, bhikkhave, puggalo akkhamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṃ duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ anadhivāsakajātiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.2: Vīsativassova kho, bhikkhave, puggalo khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṃ duruttānaṃ durāgatānaṃ vacanapathānaṃ, uppannānaṃ sārīrikānaṃ vedanānaṃ dukkhānaṃ tibbānaṃ kharānaṃ kaṭukānaṃ asātānaṃ amanāpānaṃ pāṇaharānaṃ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:49.6.3: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṃ vā bhiyyobhāvāya …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataraṃ kulaṃ ahivātakarogena kālaṅkataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.3: Te bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā ekatova piṇḍāya caranti.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.4: Atha kho so dārako pituno bhikkhāya dinnāya upadhāvitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.10: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:50.1.11: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato ānandassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ saddhaṃ pasannaṃ ahivātakarogena kālaṅkataṃ hoti, dve ca dārakā sesā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.2: Te porāṇakena āciṇṇakappena bhikkhū passitvā upadhāvanti.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.9: Kena nu kho upāyena ime dārakā na vinasseyyun”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.10: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.11: “Ussahanti pana te, ānanda, dārakā kāke uḍḍāpetun”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:51.1.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:52.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa dve sāmaṇerā honti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tattheva rājagahe vassaṃ vasi, tattha hemantaṃ, tattha gimhaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.3: “āhundarikā samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ disā andhakārā, na imesaṃ disā pakkhāyantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.4: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.1.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.2.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.2.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya anupariveṇiyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.2: “bhagavatā, āvuso ānanda, paññattaṃ dasavassāni nissāya vatthuṃ, dasavassena nissayaṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.3: Tattha ca no gantabbaṃ bhavissati, nissayo ca gahetabbo bhavissati, ittaro ca vāso bhavissati, puna ca paccāgantabbaṃ bhavissati, puna ca nissayo gahetabbo bhavissati.
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.4: Sace amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissanti, mayampi gamissāma;
pli-tv-kd1:53.3.5: no ce amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyā gamissanti, mayampi na gamissāma.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā ogaṇena bhikkhusaṃghena dakkhiṇāgiriṃ cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.3: Atha kho bhagavā dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā punadeva rājagahaṃ paccāgacchi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.5: “kiṃ nu kho, ānanda, tathāgato ogaṇena bhikkhusaṃghena dakkhiṇāgiriṃ cārikaṃ pakkanto”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.6: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:53.4.8: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena pañcavassāni nissāya vatthuṃ, abyattena yāvajīvaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.2: Na asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti na asekkhena samādhikkhandhena, na asekkhena paññākkhandhena na asekkhena vimuttikkhandhena na asekkhena vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhena samannāgato hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (1)
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.4: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.5: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato hoti asekkhena samādhikkhandhena.
pli-tv-kd1:53.5.9: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (2)
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.1: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.2: Assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (3)
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.4: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.5: Saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, upaṭṭhitassati hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.6.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (4)
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.1: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.2: Adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti, appassuto hoti, duppañño hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (5)
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.4: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.5: Na adhisīle sīlavipanno hoti, na ajjhācāre ācāravipanno hoti, na atidiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhivipanno hoti, bahussuto hoti, paññavā hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.7.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (6)
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.1: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.2: Āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso—
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (7)
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.4: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.5: Āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso—
pli-tv-kd1:53.8.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (8)

pli-tv-kd1:53.9.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (10)

pli-tv-kd1:53.12.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (6)
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.1: Aparehipi, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.2: Āpattiṃ na jānāti, anāpattiṃ na jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ na jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena na svāgatāni honti na suvibhattāni na suppavattīni na suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, ūnapañcavasso hoti—
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā na anissitena vatthabbaṃ. (7)
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.4: Chahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.5: Āpattiṃ jānāti, anāpattiṃ jānāti, lahukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, garukaṃ āpattiṃ jānāti, ubhayāni kho panassa pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti suvibhattāni suppavattīni suvinicchitāni suttaso anubyañjanaso, pañcavasso vā hoti atirekapañcavasso vā—
pli-tv-kd1:53.13.6: imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahaṅgehi samannāgatena bhikkhunā anissitena vatthabban”ti. (8)
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena kapilavatthu tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena kapilavatthu tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.4: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena suddhodanassa sakkassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.1.5: Atha kho rāhulamātā devī rāhulaṃ kumāraṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.1: Atha kho rāhulo kumāro yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato purato, aṭṭhāsi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.4: Atha kho rāhulo kumāro bhagavantaṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.7: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.2.8: “tena hi tvaṃ, sāriputta, rāhulaṃ kumāraṃ pabbājehī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.4: paṭhamaṃ kesamassuṃ ohārāpetvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādāpetvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā ‘evaṃ vadehī’ti vattabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:54.3.14: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi sāmaṇerapabbajjan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto rāhulaṃ kumāraṃ pabbājesi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.2: Atha kho suddhodano sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho suddhodano sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.1: “Bhagavati me, bhante, pabbajite anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ ahosi, tathā nande, adhimattaṃ rāhule.
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.2: Puttapemaṃ, bhante, chaviṃ chindati, chaviṃ chetvā cammaṃ chindati, cammaṃ chetvā maṃsaṃ chindati, maṃsaṃ chetvā nhāruṃ chindati, nhāruṃ chetvā aṭṭhiṃ chindati, aṭṭhiṃ chetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati.
pli-tv-kd1:54.5.3: Sādhu, bhante, ayyā ananuññātaṃ mātāpitūhi puttaṃ na pabbājeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.1: Atha kho bhagavā suddhodanaṃ sakkaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.2: Atha kho suddhodano sakko bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:54.6.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.1: Atha kho bhagavā kapilavatthusmiṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato sāriputtassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa santike dārakaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd1:55.1.12: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena ekena dve sāmaṇere upaṭṭhāpetuṃ, yāvatake vā pana ussahati ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ tāvatake upaṭṭhāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.2: “kati nu kho amhākaṃ sikkhāpadāni, kattha ca amhehi sikkhitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṃ dasa sikkhāpadāni, tesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhituṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:56.1.15: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerānaṃ imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni, imesu ca sāmaṇerehi sikkhitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāmaṇerā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharanti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.3: “kathañhi nāma sāmaṇerā bhikkhūsu agāravā appatissā asabhāgavuttikā viharissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.5: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:57.1.11: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi pañcahaṅgehi samannāgatassa sāmaṇerassa daṇḍakammaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṃ sabbaṃ saṃghārāmaṃ āvaraṇaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.6: Sāmaṇerā ārāmaṃ pavisituṃ alabhamānā pakkamantipi, vibbhamantipi, titthiyesupi saṅkamanti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.2.10: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yattha vā vasati, yattha vā paṭikkamati, tattha āvaraṇaṃ kātun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṃ mukhadvārikaṃ āhāraṃ āvaraṇaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.2: Manussā yāgupānampi saṃghabhattampi karontā sāmaṇere evaṃ vadenti—
pli-tv-kd1:57.3.9: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā sāmaṇerānaṃ mukhadvārikaṃ āhāraṃ āvaraṇaṃ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū upajjhāye anāpucchā sāmaṇerānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.3: “kathaṃ nu kho amhākaṃ sāmaṇerā na dissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:58.1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū amhe anāpucchā amhākaṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ āvaraṇaṃ karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:59.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇere apalāḷenti.
pli-tv-kd1:59.1.2: Therā sāmaṃ dantakaṭṭhampi mukhodakampi gaṇhantā kilamanti.
pli-tv-kd1:60.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upanandassa sakyaputtassa kaṇṭako nāma sāmaṇero kaṇṭakiṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ dūsesi.
pli-tv-kd1:60.1.16: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi dasahaṅgehi samannāgataṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nāsetun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro paṇḍako bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.2: So dahare dahare bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.5: “nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.6: So bhikkhūhi apasādito mahante mahante moḷigalle sāmaṇere upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.9: “nassa, paṇḍaka, vinassa, paṇḍaka, ko tayā attho”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.10: So sāmaṇerehi apasādito hatthibhaṇḍe assabhaṇḍe upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.15: Yepi imesaṃ na paṇḍakā, tepi ime paṇḍake dūsenti.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.17: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ hatthibhaṇḍānaṃ assabhaṇḍānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.18: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:61.1.19: “Paṇḍako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (1)
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño sukhumālo hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.2: Atha kho tassa purāṇakulaputtassa khīṇakolaññassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.3: “ahaṃ kho sukhumālo, na paṭibalo anadhigataṃ vā bhogaṃ adhigantuṃ, adhigataṃ vā bhogaṃ phātiṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.4: Kena nu kho ahaṃ upāyena sukhañca jīveyyaṃ, na ca kilameyyan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.5: Atha kho tassa purāṇakulaputtassa khīṇakolaññassa etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.6: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sukhasīlā sukhasamācārā, subhojanāni bhuñjitvā nivātesu sayanesu sayanti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.1.7: Yannūnāhaṃ sāmaṃ pattacīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvaseyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.2.1: Atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño sāmaṃ pattacīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhū abhivādeti.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.1: Atha kho so purāṇakulaputto khīṇakolañño āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.4: “Theyyasaṃvāsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti. (2)
pli-tv-kd1:62.3.5: Titthiyapakkantako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (3)
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro nāgo nāgayoniyā aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.3: “kena nu kho ahaṃ upāyena nāgayoniyā ca parimucceyyaṃ khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.5: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:63.1.6: Sace kho ahaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṃ, evāhaṃ nāgayoniyā ca parimucceyyaṃ, khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabheyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.1: Atha kho so nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.3: Tena kho pana samayena so nāgo aññatarena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ paccantime vihāre paṭivasati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.4: Atha kho so bhikkhu rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya ajjhokāse caṅkamati.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.5: Atha kho so nāgo tassa bhikkhuno nikkhante vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkami.
pli-tv-kd1:63.2.6: Sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu vihāraṃ pavisissāmīti kavāṭaṃ paṇāmento addasa sabbaṃ vihāraṃ ahinā puṇṇaṃ, vātapānehi bhoge nikkhante, disvāna bhīto vissaramakāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.4: “Ayaṃ, āvuso, sabbo vihāro ahinā puṇṇo, vātapānehi bhogā nikkhantā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.5: Atha kho so nāgo tena saddena paṭibujjhitvā sake āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.3.10: Atha kho so nāgo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.1: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā taṃ nāgaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.3: Gaccha tvaṃ, nāga, tattheva cātuddase pannarase aṭṭhamiyā ca pakkhassa uposathaṃ upavasa, evaṃ tvaṃ nāgayoniyā ca parimuccissasi, khippañca manussattaṃ paṭilabhissasī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:63.4.4: Atha kho so nāgo aviruḷhidhammo kirāhaṃ imasmiṃ dhammavinayeti dukkhī dummano assūni pavattayamāno vissaraṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.3: Yadā ca sajātiyā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, yadā ca vissaṭṭho niddaṃ okkamati—
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dve paccayā nāgassa sabhāvapātukammāya.
pli-tv-kd1:63.5.5: Tiracchānagato, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (4)
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro māṇavako mātaraṃ jīvitā voropesi.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.2: So tena pāpakena kammena aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.4: “kena nu kho ahaṃ upāyena imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṃ kareyyan”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.6: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā.
pli-tv-kd1:64.1.7: Sace kho ahaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṃ, evāhaṃ imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṃ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.1: Atha kho so māṇavako bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.3: “pubbepi kho, āvuso upāli, nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhūsu pabbajito.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.5: Atha kho so māṇavako āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:64.2.8: “mātughātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (5)
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro māṇavako pitaraṃ jīvitā voropesi.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.2: So tena pāpakena kammena aṭṭīyati harāyati jigucchati.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.4: “kena nu kho ahaṃ upāyena imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṃ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.6: “ime kho samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā, sace kho ahaṃ samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajeyyaṃ, evāhaṃ imassa pāpakassa kammassa nikkhantiṃ kareyyan”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.7: Atha kho so māṇavako bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.9: “pubbepi kho, āvuso upāli, nāgo māṇavakavaṇṇena bhikkhūsu pabbajito.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.11: Atha kho so māṇavako āyasmatā upālinā anuyuñjīyamāno etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:65.1.14: “Pitughātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (6)
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū sāketā sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.2: Antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā ekacce bhikkhū acchindiṃsu, ekacce bhikkhū haniṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.3: Sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā ekacce core aggahesuṃ, ekacce corā palāyiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:66.1.4: Ye te palāyiṃsu te bhikkhūsu pabbajiṃsu, ye te gahitā te vadhāya oniyyanti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.1: Addasaṃsu kho te palāyitvā pabbajitā te core vadhāya oniyyamāne, disvāna evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.2: “sādhu kho mayaṃ palāyimhā, sacā ca mayaṃ gayheyyāma, mayampi evameva haññeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.5: Atha kho te pabbajitā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:66.2.8: Arahantaghātako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (7)
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo sāketā sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.2: Antarāmagge corā nikkhamitvā ekaccā bhikkhuniyo acchindiṃsu, ekaccā bhikkhuniyo dūsesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.3: Sāvatthiyā rājabhaṭā nikkhamitvā ekacce core aggahesuṃ, ekacce corā palāyiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.4: Ye te palāyiṃsu, te bhikkhūsu pabbajiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.5: Ye te gahitā, te vadhāya oniyyanti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.6: Addasaṃsu kho te palāyitvā pabbajitā te core vadhāya oniyyamāne, disvāna evamāhaṃsu—
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.7: “sādhu kho mayaṃ palāyimhā, sacā ca mayaṃ gayheyyāma, mayampi evameva haññeyyāmā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.10: Atha kho te pabbajitā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.12: “Bhikkhunidūsako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti. (8)
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.13: Saṃghabhedako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabboti. (9)
pli-tv-kd1:67.1.14: Lohituppādako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (10)
pli-tv-kd1:68.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro ubhatobyañjanako bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:68.1.4: “Ubhatobyañjanako, bhikkhave, anupasampanno na upasampādetabbo, upasampanno nāsetabbo”ti. (11)
pli-tv-kd1:69.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anupajjhāyakaṃ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū saṃghena upajjhāyena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gaṇena upajjhāyena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:69.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇḍakupajjhāyena upasampādenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:70.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū apattakaṃ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū acīvarakaṃ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū apattacīvarakaṃ upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena pattena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena cīvarena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:70.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū yācitakena pattacīvarena upasampādenti.
pli-tv-kd1:71.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū hatthacchinnaṃ pabbājenti …pe…
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū alajjīnaṃ nissayaṃ denti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū alajjīnaṃ nissāya vasanti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.12: ‘na alajjīnaṃ nissayo dātabbo, na alajjīnaṃ nissāya vatthabban’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.13: Kathaṃ nu kho mayaṃ jāneyyāma lajjiṃ vā alajjiṃ vā”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:72.1.15: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, catūhapañcāhaṃ āgametuṃ yāva bhikkhusabhāgataṃ jānāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.5: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo addhānamaggappaṭipanno, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.1.7: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, addhānamaggappaṭipannena bhikkhunā nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū kosalesu janapade addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.4: Atha kho tassa gilānassa bhikkhuno etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.7: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo gilāno, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.2.9: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.1: Atha kho tassa gilānupaṭṭhākassa bhikkhuno etadahosi—
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.4: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo, ayañca bhikkhu gilāno, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.3.6: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānupaṭṭhākena bhikkhunā nissayaṃ alabhamānena yāciyamānena anissitena vatthun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu araññe viharati.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.2: Tassa ca tasmiṃ senāsane phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.6: Ahañcamhi nissayakaraṇīyo araññe viharāmi, mayhañca imasmiṃ senāsane phāsu hoti, kathaṃ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.8: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, āraññikena bhikkhunā phāsuvihāraṃ sallakkhentena nissayaṃ alabhamānena anissitena vatthuṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:73.4.9: yadā patirūpo nissayadāyako āgacchissati, tadā tassa nissāya vasissāmī”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato mahākassapassa upasampadāpekkho hoti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmato ānandassa santike dūtaṃ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd1:74.1.5: “nāhaṃ ussahāmi therassa nāmaṃ gahetuṃ, garu me thero”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato mahākassapassa dve upasampadāpekkhā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulānaṃ therānaṃ upasampadāpekkhā honti.
pli-tv-kd1:74.3.7: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve tayo ekānussāvane kātuṃ, tañca kho ekena upajjhāyena, na tveva nānupajjhāyenā”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kumārakassapo gabbhavīso upasampanno ahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.6: Upasampanno nu khomhi, nanu kho upasampanno”ti?
pli-tv-kd1:75.1.8: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mātukucchismiṃ paṭhamaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, paṭhamaṃ viññāṇaṃ pātubhūtaṃ, tadupādāya sāvassa jāti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena upasampannā dissanti kuṭṭhikāpi gaṇḍikāpi kilāsikāpi sosikāpi apamārikāpi.
pli-tv-kd1:76.1.3: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, upasampādentena terasa antarāyike dhamme pucchituṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ananusiṭṭhe upasampadāpekkhe antarāyike dhamme pucchanti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.2: Upasampadāpekkhā vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.2.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ anusāsitvā pacchā antarāyike dhamme pucchitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.2: Upasampadāpekkhā tatheva vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.4: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, ekamantaṃ anusāsitvā saṃghamajjhe antarāyike dhamme pucchituṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.3.8: ‘ayaṃ te patto, ayaṃ saṅghāṭi, ayaṃ uttarāsaṅgo, ayaṃ antaravāsako.
pli-tv-kd1:76.4.2: Duranusiṭṭhā upasampadāpekkhā vitthāyanti, maṅkū honti, na sakkonti vissajjetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.4.6: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, byattena bhikkhunā paṭibalena anusāsitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.5.7: attanā vā attānaṃ sammannitabbaṃ, parena vā paro sammannitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:76.5.12: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyan’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.6.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, itthannāmo itthannāmaṃ anusāseyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.1: Tena sammatena bhikkhunā upasampadāpekkho upasaṅkamitvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.3: Yaṃ jātaṃ taṃ saṃghamajjhe pucchante santaṃ atthīti vattabbaṃ, asantaṃ natthīti vattabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.7.4: Mā kho vitthāyi, mā kho maṅku ahosi.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.9: Ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vandāpetvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṃ paggaṇhāpetvā upasampadaṃ yācāpetabbo—
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.11: Ullumpatu maṃ, bhante, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.13: Ullumpatu maṃ, bhante, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:76.8.15: Ullumpatu maṃ, bhante, saṃgho anukampaṃ upādāyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.4: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, ahaṃ itthannāmaṃ antarāyike dhamme puccheyyanti?
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.5: Suṇasi, itthannāma, ayaṃ te saccakālo bhūtakālo.
pli-tv-kd1:76.9.7: Santaṃ atthīti vattabbaṃ, asantaṃ natthīti vattabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.3: Ayaṃ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.4: Itthannāmo saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.10.5: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ upasampādeyya itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.3: Itthannāmo saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.11.5: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.3: Ayaṃ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.4: Itthannāmo saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.6: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.10: Ayaṃ itthannāmo itthannāmassa āyasmato upasampadāpekkho, parisuddho antarāyikehi dhammehi, paripuṇṇassa pattacīvaraṃ.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.11: Itthannāmo saṃghaṃ upasampadaṃ yācati itthannāmena upajjhāyena.
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.13: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa upasampadā itthannāmena upajjhāyena, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-kd1:76.12.16: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.1: “Tāvadeva chāyā metabbā, utuppamāṇaṃ ācikkhitabbaṃ, divasabhāgo ācikkhitabbo, saṅgīti ācikkhitabbā, cattāro nissayā ācikkhitabbā—
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.5: saṃghabhattaṃ, uddesabhattaṃ, nimantanaṃ, salākabhattaṃ, pakkhikaṃ, uposathikaṃ, pāṭipadikaṃ. (1)
pli-tv-kd1:77.1.9: khomaṃ, kappāsikaṃ, koseyyaṃ, kambalaṃ, sāṇaṃ, bhaṅgaṃ. (2)
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ upasampādetvā ekakaṃ ohāya pakkamiṃsu.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.2: So pacchā ekakova āgacchanto antarāmagge purāṇadutiyikāya samāgañchi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.1.8: So tassā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā cirena agamāsi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.3: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, upasampādetvā dutiyaṃ dātuṃ, cattāri ca akaraṇīyāni ācikkhituṃ—
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.4: Upasampannena bhikkhunā methuno dhammo na paṭisevitabbo, antamaso tiracchānagatāyapi.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.5: Yo bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevati, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.6: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso sīsacchinno abhabbo tena sarīrabandhanena jīvituṃ;
pli-tv-kd1:78.2.7: evameva bhikkhu methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.1: Upasampannena bhikkhunā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ na ādātabbaṃ, antamaso tiṇasalākaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.2: Yo bhikkhu pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyati, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.3: Seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāya;
pli-tv-kd1:78.3.4: evameva bhikkhu pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ vā adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.1: Upasampannena bhikkhunā sañcicca pāṇo jīvitā na voropetabbo, antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.2: Yo bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropeti, antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāya, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.3: Seyyathāpi nāma puthusilā dvedhā bhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti;
pli-tv-kd1:78.4.4: evameva bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitā voropetvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.1: Upasampannena bhikkhunā uttarimanussadhammo na ullapitabbo, antamaso ‘suññāgāre abhiramāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.2: Yo bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati jhānaṃ vā vimokkhaṃ vā samādhiṃ vā samāpattiṃ vā maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā, assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.3: Seyyathāpi nāma tālo matthakacchinno abhabbo puna viruḷhiyā;
pli-tv-kd1:78.5.4: evameva bhikkhu pāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapitvā assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako vibbhami.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.4: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiyā adassane ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.1.5: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.2.8: No ce passati, labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āpattiyā appaṭikamme ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.3.18: No ce paṭikaroti labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā appaṭinissagge ukkhittako vibbhamati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.2: So puna paccāgantvā bhikkhū upasampadaṃ yācati.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.18: No ce paṭinissajjati, labbhamānāya sāmaggiyā puna ukkhipitabbo.
pli-tv-kd1:79.4.80: Yo so añño ca naggo ca,
